articles.description: Norwich City beat Huddersfield Town 2-1 at Carrow Road, goals from Josh Sargent and Danel Sinani earning the Canaries' first win of the...
articles.content:
Norwich City beat Huddersfield Town 2-1 at Carrow Road, goals from Josh Sargent and Danel Sinani earning the Canaries' first win of the Championship season.
